newsitem.title: USA: Complete Business files for share offering.
newsitem.headline: Complete Business files for share offering.

text.p: Complete Business Solutions Inc said Monday it is filing a registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to offer 2.25 million shares of no par common stock.
Of this total, 1.25 million shares will be newly issued by the company, and one million shares will be sold by selling shareholders.

The company's proceeds from the offering will be used to expand existing operations, including offshore software development operations, to develop new services, for possible acquisitions of related businesses, and for general corporate purposes, including working capital, Complete Business said.
Complete Business shares were up 5/8 at 29.
